name: Dice Rogue
description:
Enter a dungeon and reach the staircases on each floor to descend deeper and deeper, all while your actions are restricted to the roll of a dice.

This game was made for the GMTK-2022 Game jam where the theme was "Roll of the Dice".

Sorry for the lack of audio and music I didn't have much time to make a game this year as I would've hoped, however, I hope you enjoy it all the same.-

- Controls -

Wasd or Arrow Keys to move, and click and hold to drag your dice into the movement or heal box.
